result.eng: The stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ga: baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.orig: baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.html: baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidhThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ponchtml: baineann na scéalta le saiġdiúirí a ṁaraítear agus na mná a ḟágtar ina ndiaiḋThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.

result.eng: We can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ga: is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.orig: is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.html: is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ponchtml: is léir ó na rianta a d'ḟág siad ina ndiaiḋ gur beirt a ḃí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.

result.eng: He has only left behind some short, lame writings.
result.ga: ní raibh fágtha ina dhiaidh ach roinnt scríbhinní gearra bacacha
result.orig: ní raibh fágtha ina dhiaidh ach roinnt scríbhinní gearra bacacha
result.html: ní raibh fágtha ina dhiaidh ach roinnt scríbhinní gearra bacachaHe has only left behind some short, lame writings.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ fágṫa ina ḋiaiḋ aċ roinnt scríḃinní gearra bacaċaHe has only left behind some short, lame writings.

result.eng: Please stand behind the yellow line.
result.ga: seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoil
result.orig: seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoil
result.html: seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoilPlease stand behind the yellow line.
result.ponchtml: seasaigí taoḃ ṫiar den líne ḃuí le ḃur dtoilPlease stand behind the yellow line.

result.eng: I was standing behind the counter all day.
result.ga: bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an lae
result.orig: bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an lae
result.html: bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an laeI was standing behind the counter all day.
result.ponchtml: ḃí mé i mo ẛeasaṁ taoḃ ṫiar den ċuntar ar feaḋ an laeI was standing behind the counter all day.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: d'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: d'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.html: d'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaiḋ agus isteaċ leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.eng: She left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ga: d'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.orig: d'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinn
result.html: d'fhág sí beirt iníonacha óga ina diaidh nuair a tháinig sí go hÉirinnShe left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág sí beirt iníonaċa óga ina diaiḋ nuair a ṫáinig sí go hÉirinnShe left two young daughters behind when she came to Ireland.

result.eng: There are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ga: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araon
result.orig: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araon
result.html: tá idir fhíricí agus bhreithiúnas sa mhéid sin seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.
result.ponchtml: tá idir ḟíricí agus ḃreiṫiúnas sa ṁéid sin seasaim leo araonThere are both facts and judgement in what I have just said. I stand behind them both.

result.eng: Errigal appeared {emerged from behind the horizon}.
result.html: nocht an teargalErrigal appeared {emerged from behind the horizon}.
result.ponchtml: noċt an teargalErrigal appeared {emerged from behind the horizon}.
